channel.title: Looking for an Experienced Coder/Developer?
channel.description:
Hello guys, I am 1827, Some of you may know who i am and most of you wont, I started coding RSPS about 3 1/2 years ago and the projects that i have worked on before i thought were actually pretty good for someone who hasn't been in the coding world that long. I have also been a Co-Owner/Developer for several big name servers, If you are looking for an Experienced Developer for Either Client/Source or both. I Mainly work with 317's/ 508's. If you are interested in my help, There will be no payment that i ask, This is simply Trying to get back into coding and Hopefully running/Co running Something in the future. If you are interested Please Email me at- Mod-dean@hotmail.com. Or post back On this thread and we can talk.
Best Regards,
1827.

item.title: Looking for an Experienced Coder/Developer?
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[center][b]Hello there i currently run a online server with a 24-7 vps - blacklist - firewall - domain - site - server.

we only have 2 coders my self & pepsi we are searching for coders we do split donations depending on how much work has been done.

We work mostly all day on the server.

couple of big problems we cant manage to fix maybe u could try.

skype:haviland41[/b][/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for an Experienced Coder/Developer?
item.dc:creator: @TheGodzGang TheGodzGang
item.description:
@TheGodzGang wrote:

Hello,

If u want to help me thank you,
I posted already a topic about it and a guy helped me out but…
I got 23 errors,
From Jframe.java

If u want more info go to this links:
The code:
http://pastebin.com/7J6mSzT3

The topic:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

And i got a other question how to change the loading bar like this,
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/270009-galkons-refactored-new-loading-bar-almost-100-a.html/
But this is for galkon…
I want it like this, And i already made the sprites by myself.
My source: Project insanity of jack
Revision: 317 pi

Thank you for help

SKYPE: mgsfx.

Read full topic
